content: this cowl was designed for the 2023 minnesota yarn shop hop yarn was custom-dyed by fiber macgyver 1 the theme for the hop was under the sea and our shop theme was schools of fish the cowl was designed with schools of fish in mind we think knitters are like fish we find our community help and protect each other the pattern is an easy slipped stitch replicating fish swimming in a school 1 https //www darnknitanyway com/shop/yarn/yarn-by-brand/fiber-macgyver/p/shop-hop-yarn-2023-x69026983 htm
